page.title: 03The Highwoods Development.
page.content: There are lots of different kinds of new houses and many companies building them.These include Tarmac, Brosely, Barrat, and French-Kier.The whole development will take 6 years to complete.A new primary school is expected to be built for the children who move there.Colchester Borough Council have set up a country park to be included in Highwoods .It will contain a picnic area,a golf course, foot- and cycle-paths,and a caravan and camping site. A major feature of the development is Tesco's Hypermarket.It is already well established but work has begun on enlarging and improving the facilities there. The nearby petrol station,which sells cut-price products,and the large car-park encourage people to come from a very wide area.
